// Pivot 0, 0
int paddle2[16] = {
	1, 2,
	27, 2,
	29, 4,
	29, 8,
	27, 10,
	21, 10,
	1, 3,
	77, 16
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float paddle2[16] = {
	0.033333f, 0.181818f,
	0.900000f, 0.181818f,
	0.966667f, 0.363636f,
	0.966667f, 0.727273f,
	0.900000f, 0.909091f,
	0.700000f, 0.909091f,
	0.033333f, 0.272727f,
	2.566667f, 1.454545f
};
